title: Bitcoin or Ethereum: Which Is Better Post Crypto Flash Crash
description: The recent crypto flash crash hit traders and investors by surprise, with most crypto charts painted in red as billions were wiped from portfolios overnight. Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) were not spared, with the duo seeing double-digit losses as traders hastily liquidated positions. According to reports from Coinglass, over 1.6 million traders ...
